replies.body: I pulled off a 24-4 game w/one ace and 2 rounds of 4 kills yesterday on a competitive, but I didn't record it :c
replies.body_tagged: I pulled off a 24-4 game w/one ace and 2 rounds of 4 kills yesterday on a competitive, but I didn't record it :c

replies.body:
Nice!
You can watch your games without recording them by going to the WATCH menu at the home screen, then my matches, then download it. Then go and right click to play it!
replies.body_tagged:
